item.title: RecordShop Tycoon
item.description: Run your own record store in Rubato Hills and become the major store in the city. Some of the tasks youÂ´re assigned to are to do purche the CDs, improve your store with upgrades, invest in advertising, etc. Are you ready for this challenge?
